item.title: AWS Credentials via SAML (SSO)
item.author: asdrubal@juniqe.com (Asdrubal Gonzalez Penton)
item.description: If you want to have AWS API access for any script or terraform or even just AWS CLI outside of AWS you need to have a working AWS credential. Making and maintenance of such credentials could be a problem and big security issue. Luckily with login via Google IDP, we don’t have anymore permanent keys. The problem that engineers don’t have API access. As a solution - we can assumeRoleWith SAML to obtain the AWS STS token.
